      • updateUser

        public java.util.Optional<User> updateUser(User updatedUser)
        Description copied from interface: UserService
        Updates a user in the database, using its id to find it. The update can only contain a part of the fields of the User object, for instance only the username. In that case, the other null fields will keep their initial values.
        Specified by:
        updateUser in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        updatedUser - An updated User object, or an empty optional if the user wasn't found.
